Transaction Time for Buying ETC at CoinUnit ATM in Hong Kong

Assuming you meant ETC (Ethereum Classic) instead of a typo for BTC, here’s the estimated time for purchasing ETC using a CoinUnit (CoinUnited.io) ATM in Hong Kong, based on available information and general crypto ATM operations as of October 2025:

Overall Process Time:

  • End-to-End (Cash to Wallet Receipt): Typically 3-10 minutes.
    • ATM Interaction: 1-2 minutes – Scan your Ethereum Classic wallet QR code, insert cash (HKD), confirm the rate, and receive a transaction ID/receipt.
    • Crypto Dispatch: Near-instant to 3 minutes – CoinUnit ATMs, powered by General Bytes, process transactions quickly, sending ETC to your wallet address after cash verification.
    • First Confirmation: 1-5 minutes on average – Ethereum Classic’s blockchain is faster than Bitcoin’s, with block times around 13-15 seconds. You’ll typically see the ETC in your wallet as “confirmed” within a few minutes under normal network conditions.

Key Factors Affecting Time:

  • Network Congestion: Ethereum Classic’s blockchain is generally faster than Bitcoin’s, but during high traffic, confirmations might take 5-10 minutes. Check network status on explorers like blockscout.com for real-time data.
  • Transaction Size and KYC: Smaller transactions (e.g., < HKD 10,000) require minimal or no ID verification, keeping the process under 5 minutes. Larger amounts may need ID scans, adding 1-2 minutes.
  • Wallet Setup: Use a compatible ETC wallet (e.g., Trust Wallet, Ledger, or Emerald Wallet) with a scannable QR code for quick input. Ensure your wallet is set up to receive ETC to avoid delays.

User Experience and Comparisons:

  • CoinUnit ATMs are praised for speed and ease, with reviews noting transactions as “a breeze” and “fast.” ETC, like other supported coins (BTC, ETH, USDT), benefits from their streamlined General Bytes hardware.
  • Compared to competitors like Localcoin or HK Bitcoin ATM, CoinUnit’s process is similar, with ETC transactions often faster than BTC due to Ethereum Classic’s quicker block times.
  • No widespread reports of delays or issues with CoinUnit ATMs for ETC specifically, based on available feedback.

Recommendations:

  • Test Small: Start with a small transaction to confirm the process and check wallet compatibility.
  • Monitor Network: Use a blockchain explorer to track your transaction if it doesn’t appear within 10 minutes.
  • Contact Support: If ETC doesn’t show up within 15-20 minutes, reach out to CoinUnit’s 24/7 support via coinunit.io with your transaction ID.
